        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2557</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">THe Formation of Fuels under the earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Anordnung der Kraftstoffe unter der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La formation des carburants sous la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A formação dos combustíveis sob a terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La formazione dei combustibili sotto la terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">THe σχηματισμός των καυσίμων κάτω από τη γη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La formación de combustibles bajo la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates where and how fuels were formed and trapped under the earth.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geomorphologic phenomenon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fossil fuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die wo zeigt und wie Kraftstoffe 
unter der Masse gebildet und eingeschlossen wurden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre où et comment des 
carburants ont été formés et emprisonnés sous la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre onde e como os 
combustíveis foram dados forma e prendidos sob a terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra dove e come i 
combustibili sono stati formati e bloccato stati sotto la terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει όπου και πώς τα 
καύσιμα διαμορφώθηκαν και παγιδεύτηκαν κάτω από τη γη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra donde y cómo los 
combustibles fueron formados y atrapados bajo la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
